Author: FeatherWorld
Text: Punishing yourself is just self bullying. We all have hard times and the best thing we can do is acknowledge the reality of the situation and be gentle with ourselves. It's ok that you have backslid into unhealthy patterns. The first step is climbing back on the wagon and taking active steps to a better future. The hardest part is starting, but tomorrow is a new day. And finding a job is HARD. You can have a good resume and still it can take months and months of obsessive applying and countless interviews to get one.  You are NOT a failure. You *will* get one eventually. And you still deserve to rest and relax and enjoy the moment. And LIVE.

Author: colazerocultleader
Text: I don't know what to say other than that I'm proud of you treating you body the way it deserves and being nice to yourself. I wish you the best
